name: DEAD LETTER DEPT. [DEMO]
description:
Your official title is a Data Conversion Operator, but you're really more like a warm body who types up all the junk computers still can't read.

You go to work & process the images displayed on your terminal, and type up whatever text is in front of you. Whatever can be made out, that is. Letters and lost mail, some mangled and twisted, that have travelled from place to place with nowhere else to go. Sometimes the mail you receive is a little strange. Sometimes, it feels like it's talking to you directly through the screen.

|

This is the DEMO for DEAD LETTER DEPT.-  an atmospheric typing horror game where you use your computer keyboard to transcribe various mangled-mail text prompts, and attempt to decipher damaged images as oddities begin to appear. Project currently in development.

Contains flashing lights and mature details.

|


Mouse & Keyboard are REQUIRED
[key-rebinding supported]
